page.title: 08Recreation in Woodley
page.content: {Sonning Golf Club}is to the north of Woodley. It comprises an 18 hole golf course, a putting green, squash courts a club house and a shop where sports equipment can be bought or hired. A full game of golf costs Â£10.50 per person; yearly membership is Â£190 inclusive of green fees. A separate membership is available for squash. {Ashenbury Park}is a new recreation area opened in 1982. Planned on site of former Woodley refuse tip, covering approximately 18 acres. Finishing date for pitches 1984/5. Buildings, still in planning stage, include pavilions and car parks. Facilities include 1 cricket pitch, 3 football pitches, 1 rugby pitch and 1 putting green. Picnic areas, lakes, children's play area and woodland walks are already in existence. More trees are to be planted in the near future.
